faq.question: "Will I get paid for the work I do?"
faq.answer: No, you will be creating products for nonprofits at no cost. You have to be driven by gaining experience and building something impactfull

faq.question: "How does our rent get paid?"
faq.answer: Occasionally we have have to create small side projects to create some income to cover costs, itâ€™s up to you how this will work

faq.question: "Where is the office located?"
faq.answer: We are currently changing location, we will let you know about the new place when it is ready - Toronto Downtown

faq.question: "What kind of tasks will I be doing?"
faq.answer: You can contribute to products in any way you want. Everything that brings us closer to finish and provides you more experience.

faq.question: "Do I need to be a coder?"
faq.answer: No, a digital product does not only need technical people. You want to do UX, UI or product management? Apply!

faq.question: "How do we work?"
faq.answer: In an awesome teamstructure! Our office is open 24/7 team up late or at 5 in the morning, You decide!
